EmailTemplate.name: Fact Sheet Incomplete Properties
EmailTemplate.subject: Fact Sheet Incomplete Properties - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customer Name: {!Case.ACCT_Name__c}<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /> Account Number: {!Case.ACCT_Account_Number__c} Requestor Name: {!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c} Account Owner: {!Account.OwnerFullName}
Click here to go to the support case
Please update the Properties for the Fact Sheet and resend to be loaded. 1) Unprotect the document ( If sheet is protected) 2) Go to FILE 3) Click on PROPERTIES 4) Fill out these fields a) Title: TYPE COMPANY NAME b) Subject: TYPE CUSTOMERS ACCOUNT # c) Author: TYPE ACCOUNT MANAGER NAME or IMPLEMENTATION PERSON d) Company: TYPE OFFICE DEPOT
To unprotect the file go to TOOLS and click Unprotect Document
Thank you,
Account Maintenance Team
